TopicTitle: [0.25] Lionhead Aerospace Inc. - Icarus v0.4 updated

Articles.Content:
Prometheus is in testing and final tweaks, Pandora works but with awfull greyish textures for .dae files (lasor head and wheels). I need to fix that.

Thank you for quick response. DLC engine didn't work but now after I put it in Lionhead catalogue (not Parts like in old days) it works

I said this many times but keep up with the good work Yogui87, your work is great and I'm always happy to see new mods from Lionhead Aerospace.
Damn.. Still having that decompression problem. Any chance you could upload a mirror or something, Yogui? Itd be greatly appreciated!

Damn.. Still having that decompression problem. Any chance you could upload a mirror or something, Yogui? Itd be greatly appreciated!

What mod ?
Your ESA pack. After you released the last update, I havent been able to download the pack properly, my computer, and the other computers Ive tried, cannot decompress the archive

Here a mirror link: http://www./?6covm1r94m4gw62

Hope you could decompress it.

Here a mirror link: http://www./?6covm1r94m4gw62

Hope you could decompress it.

Merci beaucoup! Lets see if it works now

Results: It took a lot of finagling, but I got it, thanks!

Edited June 21, 2013 by Budgie
Are you by any chance going to include the Viking landers in the probe pack?
I never got around to asking because it's such a small issue, but why is the Parachute part for the Thor backshell colored grey instead of white now? It's been that way since the .20 update.

Are you by any chance going to include the Viking landers in the probe pack?

Viking will have its own mod, but I 'll make it at the same time.

I never got around to asking because it's such a small issue, but why is the Parachute part for the Thor backshell colored grey instead of white now? It's been that way since the .20 update.

It's a 0.20 issue, all .dae files have grey textures. I'll fix that soon to.

Sorry for the much questions, but are you also going to make the Rosetta space probe or any other?

Sadly KSP doesn't have a asteroids.

Edited June 22, 2013 by onlinegamesz
Yes, Rosetta too.

Sorry for the much questions, but are you also going to make the Rosetta space probe or any other?

Sadly KSP doesn't have a asteroids.

Don't worry. Asteroids are coming in one of the future updates of KSP as proposed. I think they'll also add an asteroid belt.

Sorry for the much questions, but are you also going to make the Rosetta space probe or any other?

Sadly KSP doesn't have a asteroids.

SpacePort has asteroids.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/20-asteroids-from-fasa-2/
Hello all, need some help with the Pandora rover. After the update the wheels hang out. if i incress scale by.5 will this help or do i need to incress rescale by .5
It's broken, Yogui is working on it.

Hello all, need some help with the Pandora rover. After the update the wheels hang out. if i incress scale by.5 will this help or do i need to incress rescale by .5

I'm working on it, just need to fix all parts using .dae files, because 0.20 version don't like these files anymore and turns the textures into dark grey.
Copy Thanks Apollo

This news to announce the release of the latest update for Prometheus and Pandora rovers. Now you can play 0.20.x with these rovers.

You can follow next releases on the new Lionhead blog here.

Will all your updates be part of that blog? What will happen to this thread?

And thanks for the Rovers, I'm eager to try them out!

This thread is the official and main one, and still be. Everything is announced and shown here.

The blog is just to have more visibility with new players.
Is the HSTWlaser plugin a part of Romfarer's laser mod? Searched HSTWlaser on spaceport and the forums and couldn't find anything.
It's the sunbeam plugin.

As WCOLE360 said, it's the sunbeam plugin (the link is in the Instructions text file in the archive), but I'm very kind today so here the link too: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/sunbeam/

Here the official video of ESA historical pack made by SuestraGaming
